title: How to Remove Liquids, Diarrhea, Cat and Dog Urine from Carpet

steps.headline: Using nozzle of the hose, turn on wet/dry vacuum cleaner and hold it about ⁄8 inch (0.3 cm) above spill.
Vacuum up ANYTHING possible without touching the carpet before it has a chance to soak into the carpet.
Immediately begin spraying the area with a spray bottle with water in it.
steps.description: Continuously spray the water as you vacuum at the same time. The water will dilute the spot and the vacuum will pull it out of the carpet as you do this.

steps.headline: Using the edge of the hose (the end of it), start rubbing the spot as you vacuum and spray at the same time.
Repeat until you can see nothing left.

For animal urine or waste, you MUST pour distilled white vinegar on the carpet or a product that neutralizes the urine or other animal odors, covering the area thoroughly (even one small hint of urine you may still smell later).
steps.description: The odor of the vinegar will disappear once it dries within a few days and it will help remove bacteria.

steps.headline: It is recommended to clean your wet/dry vacuum cleaner after use.

text: Using nozzle of the hose, turn on wet/dry vacuum cleaner and hold it about ⁄8 inch (0.3 cm) above spill.  Vacuum up ANYTHING possible without touching the carpet before it has a chance to soak into the carpet.  Immediately begin spraying the area with a spray bottle with water in it. Continuously spray the water as you vacuum at the same time. The water will dilute the spot and the vacuum will pull it out of the carpet as you do this. Using the edge of the hose (the end of it), start rubbing the spot as you vacuum and spray at the same time.  Repeat until you can see nothing left.  For animal urine or waste, you MUST pour distilled white vinegar on the carpet or a product that neutralizes the urine or other animal odors, covering the area thoroughly (even one small hint of urine you may still smell later). The odor of the vinegar will disappear once it dries within a few days and it will help remove bacteria. It is recommended to clean your wet/dry vacuum cleaner after use.
